text:
Message 664 of 4024
Adrian is my son. You have neither sole legal custody or a parenting plan that you agree to follow. Given those two things, and the insistence on
defying any commonly accepted standard parenting practices,
I am asking to be involved in decisions about what he is doing, with who, and how he gets back and forth. If we had a parenting plan, I would
consider it to be your time, and not bother. But we don’t. So I am making a documented request that I’m involved in these decisions about my
children.
Sent:01/23/2024 at 09:23 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/23/2024 at 09:23 AM)
Subject:Re: AD Basketball today
Message 665 of 4024
Why did you call before then? It makes zero sense. Nothing you have done since Juily 4th has.
You asked on OFW why we needed to chat. I told you. You called. Then said you can't chat.
Please help me understand what that means? It makes no sense at while a locksmith is there.
Or are you busy explaining that you are married but it has never mattered to you. Stick that key in!
Sent:01/23/2024 at 09:26 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/23/2024 at 09:27 AM)
Subject:Re: Please call me
Message 666 of 4024
Given the serious concerns Adrian raised regarding the surveillance , I paused the plan we initially aligned in, and requested to regroup with Dr.
Brown to factor the impacts.
You have refused to move forward on that.
Please make any requests via your lawyer and we can let them handle if you have concerns with the current situation.
